snippet: Describing the eurozone economy as “steadily recovering,” Mario Draghi, the president of the European Central Bank, called on Monday for a “quantum leap” in European integration.
abstract: European Central Bank president Mario Draghi, describing eurozone economy as 'steadily recovering,' calls for 'quantum leap' in European integration.
lead_paragraph: Describing the eurozone economy as “steadily recovering,” Mario Draghi, the president of the European Central Bank, called on Monday for a “quantum leap” in European integration.

headline.print_headline: Central Bank Chief Urges Stronger European Ties
headline.main: Central Bank Chief Urges Stronger European Ties
